dmca.title: COPYRIGHT VIOLATION(BIA2.COM)
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal
<http://www.theplanet.com/legal> .

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: avanesian@aol.com [mailto:avanesian@aol.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, October 25, 2006 7:46 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: COPYRIGHT VIOLATION(BIA2.COM)
Subject: Fwd: COPYRIGHT VIOLATION(BIA2.COM)


 
 
 
-----Original Message-----
From: avanesian@aol.com
To: www.abuse@secureserver.net
Sent: Wed, 4 Oct 2006 4:08 PM
Subject: COPYRIGHT VIOLATION


 Dear sir
 
 
Taraneh Enterprises Inc. is a record company based in california, which
has more than five thousand 
soung recordings and music videos, Taraneh is the copyright hoder of
these material. Unfortunately
(BIA2.COM.COM) has displayed all thse from hundreds of singer on their
website with no permission
displaying music videos from an artist who's album was released on 30th
of September last week.
displayin music in any format on this site is hurting our business, we
would advise you to remove the 
entire music section from persinway.com otherwise we will take legal
action. we will wait untill 5 pm.
on Friday October the 6th. If not removed we will take legal action on
following Tuesday.
You can check our website www.taraneh <http://www.taraneh/>  records.com
to underestand the extent of this violation.
 
 
Thank You
 
 
 
Rafik Avanesin
 
Tel:818-7081166
